__e: - Mr. Forbes, did you see your attacker?
She might not even have seen her attacker.
The assailant couldn't have been more than three feet away.
You would only have looked at her once she shouted, and by then the mugger was on the corner.
So, you figured out I'm not the one who attacked you. Way to go.
My father told me to strike first and to strike fast and to always be the aggressor!
We're doing everything we can to find your attacker.
And the best way to help him now is to help us find the person who did hurt him.
